definitions.text: a technique used in behavior therapy; client is flooded with experiences of a particular kind until becoming either averse to them or numbed to them
fill quickly beyond capacity; as with a liquid
examples: the basement was inundated after the storm
The swollen river flooded the village
The broken vein had flooded blood in her eyes
flood the market with tennis shoes
Glut the country with cheap imports from the Orient
Our basement flooded during the heavy rains
